Entries.default: "Walk cautiously - the entropic energy in these winds will tear our souls to ribbons!"
"Careful, captain. These winds are blowing hard enough to pluck our tailfeathers."
"Good lord of light! This wind'll reap you sure as Gaun's sharpened sickle!"
"Step lightly, cap. That wind be colder than Rymrgand's frosty bollocks."
"These winds can shear spirit from flesh. Be careful."
"These winds can claim your soul... according to the old tales, anyway."
"Folk tales say those winds'll carry your soul right out your body! Watch your step."
"These winds will strip us down to the bone if we are not careful."
